floor-0.description: The base color for the whole screen (or page). Use it in case you want the content to be placed directly on this layer.

floor-0-grouped.description: The base color for the whole screen (or page). Use it in case you want to place containers with content on top of this layer.

floor-1.description: For containers placed on top of floor-0 layer. In Admin Panel: left menu, Drawers, Bottom sheets

floor-2.description: For containers placed on top of floor-1 layer or surface. In Admin Panel: Tabbars, Dialogs, Dropdowns

floor-3.description: For containers placed on top of floor-2 or surface.

surface.description: For more contrasting containers placed on top of ANY floor.

action-primary.description: For icons and other graphic elements placed together with text of color text/action. Attn! If tomorrow Bolt's brand color became pink, should your element still be green? If the answer is YES, use POSITIVE color instead. Is your element a link? If YES, use LINK color instead.

action-secondary.description: For icons and other graphic elements placed NOT together with text of color text/action. Attn! If tomorrow Bolt's brand color became pink, should your element still be green? If the answer is YES, use POSITIVE color instead. Is your element a link? If YES, use LINK color instead.
